CardHello.card-hello-description: I enjoy learning new things and try to overcome new challenges while analyzing how I improved through them.

experience.title: Works
experience.paragraph: I am a passionate self-taught software developer seeking new challenges. I specialize in front-end and serverless backend development using TypeScript, React.js, and Node.js. Even when faced with challenging problems, I know how to address them with patience, determination, and unwavering perseverance.

Autonomous.achievements: Portal with Authentication: I developed a portal with authentication options via email or Google to ensure user security. | Task Dashboard: I created an intuitive dashboard allowing users to efficiently manage their tasks, with visual graphics providing a clear view of progress. | ReactJS Projects: I participated in several projects involving ReactJS, Tailwind, Node.js, MongoDB, and other technologies, contributing to the development of innovative and scalable solutions. |Added by me: Additionally, I focused on optimizing performance and usability in each project, always aiming to deliver a high-quality user experience. | Login System: I implemented a secure and user-friendly login system to ensure user authentication. | Design Process: I led the design process from the prototyping stage in Figma to code implementation, ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience. | Technologies Used: To develop this platform, I utilized technologies such as Next.js, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, ReactUI, daisyUI.

SIA-srl.achievements: Device Management | Installation and repair of Apple devices | Package shipments and storage management | Problem solving

1.description: Implemented a secure and user-friendly login system.

Skills.card-skills-subtitle: I constantly try to improve myself
Skills.card-skills-description: I am also learning TailwindCSS via my open source repos. Other than that, I also constantly practice web design.
